roleset.name: talk about
roleset.note: DISCUSS-V NOTES: No VNcls. Comparison with other verbs-of-talking. (from discuss.01-v)
DISCUSSION-N NOTES: Corresponds with discuss.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from discussion.01-n)

example.name: plain ol' transitive
example.text: He-1 declined *trace*-1 to discuss other terms of the issue.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John discussed the details of his parole with Mary.

example.name: merged args 0 and 1
example.text: John and Mary discussed the price of beans in China.
example.arg: the price of beans in China

example.name: All args
example.text: Meg's discussion of bluegrass with Spiderman ended in shouting.
